trans-unit.source: What happened to my Cordova project (Visual Studio Connected Services) | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: What happened to my Cordova project (Visual Studio Connected Services) | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Describes what happened to your Azure Cordova project after adding Azure Mobile Services by using Visual Studio Connected Services
trans-unit.target: Describes what happened to your Azure Cordova project after adding Azure Mobile Services by using Visual Studio Connected Services

trans-unit.source: What happened to my Azure Cordova project after adding Azure Mobile Services by using Visual Studio Connected Services?
trans-unit.target: What happened to my Azure Cordova project after adding Azure Mobile Services by using Visual Studio Connected Services?

trans-unit.source: The Azure Mobile Service Client plugin included with all Multi-Device Hybrid Apps has been enabled.
trans-unit.target: The Azure Mobile Service Client plugin included with all Multi-Device Hybrid Apps has been enabled.

trans-unit.source: Connection string values for Mobile Services
trans-unit.target: Connection string values for Mobile Services

trans-unit.source: Under `services\mobileServices\settings`, a new JavaScript (.js) file with a **MobileServiceClient** was generated containing the selected mobile service’s application URL and application key.
trans-unit.target: Under `services\mobileServices\settings`, a new JavaScript (.js) file with a **MobileServiceClient** was generated containing the selected mobile service’s application URL and application key.

trans-unit.source: The file contains the initialization of a mobile service client object, similar to the following code.
trans-unit.target: The file contains the initialization of a mobile service client object, similar to the following code.
